languages.text: "Они сказали, что чувствуют в них фанатичную преданность и... голод. Я решила, что вам потребуется помощь, и распорядилась выслать отряд блюстителей вам на помощь. Они обнаружили, что шлюз заперт, но, хвала Императору, им удалось его вскрыть, пусть и не самым изящным методом".

"They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."
languages.original_text: "Они сказали, что чувствуют в них фанатичную преданность и... голод. Я решила, что вам потребуется помощь, и распорядилась выслать отряд блюстителей вам на помощь. Они обнаружили, что шлюз заперт, но, хвала Императору, им удалось его вскрыть, пусть и не самым изящным методом".

They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

languages.text: « Ils ont dit avoir ressenti leur loyauté fanatique et leur... appétit. J'ai pensé que vous auriez besoin d'aide et j'ai dépêché une escouade de prévôts en renfort. Constatant que le sas était inopérant, ils sont parvenus à en forcer l'ouverture de manière aussi brutale qu'efficace. L'Empereur bénisse leur ingéniosité. »
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont dit avoir ressenti leur loyauté fanatique et leur... appétit. J'ai pensé que vous auriez besoin d'aide et j'ai dépêché une escouade de prévôts en renfort. Constatant que le sas était inopérant, ils sont parvenus à en forcer l'ouverture de manière aussi brutale qu'efficace. L'Empereur bénisse leur ingéniosité. »

languages.text: “他们说，他们感觉到了那些人狂热的忠诚与……饥渴。我认为您可能需要支援，于是我派了一队执法者前往支援。他们发现气闸已经坏了，于是就想办法把它撬开了。尽管手段有点粗暴，但赞美帝皇，他们的聪明才智值得称道。”
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

traits.locale_text: “他们说，他们感觉到了那些人狂热的忠诚与……饥渴。我认为您可能需要支援，于是我派了一队执法者前往支援。他们发现气闸已经坏了，于是就想办法把它撬开了。尽管手段有点粗暴，但赞美帝皇，他们的聪明才智值得称道。”

languages.text: "Sie sagten, sie könnten ihre fanatische Loyalität spüren und ihren ... Hunger. Ich dachte, Ihr könntet vielleicht Hilfe gebrauchen, und habe einen Trupp Enforcers als Verstärkung angefordert. Sie haben festgestellt, dass die Luftschleuse deaktiviert wurde, konnten sie jedoch öffnen ... wenn auch auf unsanfte Weise. Der Imperator sei für ihren Einfallsreichtum gepriesen."
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

traits.locale_text: "Sie sagten, sie könnten ihre fanatische Loyalität spüren und ihren ... Hunger. Ich dachte, Ihr könntet vielleicht Hilfe gebrauchen, und habe einen Trupp Enforcers als Verstärkung angefordert. Sie haben festgestellt, dass die Luftschleuse deaktiviert wurde, konnten sie jedoch öffnen ... wenn auch auf unsanfte Weise. Der Imperator sei für ihren Einfallsreichtum gepriesen."

languages.text: «Han dicho que pudieron percibir su ferviente lealtad y su... hambre. Supuse que necesitaría ayuda y he enviado personal de seguridad como refuerzo. Vieron que la esclusa se había desactivado, pero consiguieron abrirla a la fuerza. Aunque no fueron particularmente cuidadosos en el proceso. Demos gracias al Emperador por su brillante solución».
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

traits.locale_text: «Han dicho que pudieron percibir su ferviente lealtad y su... hambre. Supuse que necesitaría ayuda y he enviado personal de seguridad como refuerzo. Vieron que la esclusa se había desactivado, pero consiguieron abrirla a la fuerza. Aunque no fueron particularmente cuidadosos en el proceso. Demos gracias al Emperador por su brillante solución».

languages.text: 「彼らの話では、激しい忠誠心と…飢えを感じたとのことです。陛下が助けを必要とされるかと思って、バックアップにエンフォーサーの部隊を派遣するよう命じました。部隊はエアロックが動かないことに気づいたものの、上品なやり方ではないですが、なんとかこじ開けることに成功しています。その独創性は、皇帝に讃えられるべきです」
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの話では、激しい忠誠心と…飢えを感じたとのことです。陛下が助けを必要とされるかと思って、バックアップにエンフォーサーの部隊を派遣するよう命じました。部隊はエアロックが動かないことに気づいたものの、上品なやり方ではないですが、なんとかこじ開けることに成功しています。その独創性は、皇帝に讃えられるべきです」

languages.text: "Onların fanatik sadakatini ve... Açlıklarını hissedebildiklerini söylediler. Yardıma gereksinim duyabileceğinizi düşündüm ve bir infazcı grubunu size destek olmaları için gönderdim. Hava kilidi devre dışıymış ama onu pek de nazik yöntemler kullanmayarak, zorla açtılar. Sahip oldukları pratik zekâ için İmparator'a şükürler olsun."
languages.original_text: "They said they could feel their fanatical loyalty and... hunger. I figured you might need help and ordered to have a squad of enforcers sent as backup. They found the airlock had been disabled, but managed to pry it open, albeit in a less than delicate manner. Emperor be praised for their ingenuity."
